runs.comm: that is big turn, huge turn, beats batsman and keeper, and goes very close to the stumps
low full toss now and he whips it powerfully from off past midwicket
on middle, he nudges wide of midwicket off the front foot
pushed through outside off, played out to extra cover
worked through square leg
moves forward and defends down the track
swinging away first up, good length outside off, pushed from the crease to point
into the pads now, just back of a length, he swivels and swings it down to fine leg
gets forward to a full away swinger, pushes to extra cover
flicked to the deep midwicket rope, in the air, Hilfenhaus bowling it full into the pads, and it was put away
pushes softly behind point, he wants the single but is sent back as Warner gets to the ball
bat in front of pad to work a length ball off the stumps to midwicket
high full toss whipped over midwicket, there is a man in the deep
length ball now, he whips it away again, in the air, past midwicket's dive
into the pads once more, and worked in front of square leg
pacy and short from Cummins, he ducks under it
length ball pushed out to extra cover off the front foot
pull falls short of extra cover, hurried into the stroke by a sharp short one, completely mistimes it, done in by the pace, it falls just in front of the man running in at extra cover
defends a length ball on the stumps
walks across and whips a length ball from outside off past midwicket
yorker, jammed back to the bowler
right on off and middle, gets bat around front pad to defend
goes for a pull to a short ball outside off, beaten by the pace
wow, what a reply, not that short at all, he picks it up from outside off and blasts it over midwicket
four more, full into the pads, flicked in the air, not far from short fine leg, not close enough to his dive
plays out a bouncing length ball to point from the crease
punches a length ball to covers

slower one gets the breakthrough, he set him up with some pacy ones, had him coming forward to a pitched up ball now,  bowled a lot slower, Hafeez ends up working it softly in the air to short midwicket
bouncer first up, he ducks under
crisp clip, the back of a length ball has raced off the pads and even though it slows down near the deep midwicket rope, it has enough to trickle over
thick inside edge to square leg as he pushes forward
low full toss wide outside off, he is fortunate that has been driven to extra cover
leading edge rolls to mid off
worked to deep midwicket
straightening flat and shortish, he goes down very early and swings it through square leg
tries to sweep from well outside off, beaten by the sharp turn
pushes a pitched up ball around off down the pitch
fine shot, full on off, he hits it straight past the non-striker, and beats mid off
worked down the pitch as he shuffles across
gets on top of a short of a length ball and pulls along the ground to deep midwicket
short on leg, pulled hard and almost carried to fine leg, went very quickly, and fell just in front of Watson there, he did well to stop the ball from rolling into the rope
gone, swings at a pitched up ball, it holds its line a tad, Jamshed misses, and is bowled, straightforward T20 dismissal
chops it into the ground outside off
bounce and turn outside off, he slashes, and a thick edge flies past slip
bowled slower, tossed up, defended off the front foot
lunges forward for the sweep and sends it to fine leg
slaps a short and flat one past a diving extra cover
chops a skiddy one just outside off, to slip
on middle and angled in from a length, worked to midwicket
fine drive, to a full one outside off, crisp followthrough sends the ball to extra cover
slower one now, length ball outside off, beats him on the cut
weaves out of the way of a short ball outside off
lunges forward to an offcutter and defends
goes down on a knee and drops the wrists to avoid another bouncer
opens the face to place the punch off the back foot past extra cover
mishits it down the pitch as he takes a swing at it
reverse sweep now, a powerful one too, safely over and wide of short fine leg
inside out, over extra cover, lovely stroke, tossed up full around off, and he immediately latched on
Kamran taking Pakistan closer, tossed up full again from Maxwell, a bit wider, Kamran reaches out forward and thumps it hard over wide long off
forward to a quicker one and eases it with an open face to point
swings in and bounces from a good length, nudged behind square, they trot out for a second, but Nazir makes it back just in time
opens the face and guides a length ball to point
down the track and has a heave at a back of a length ball, misses by a long way
slower one straightens outside off, defended softly to the bowler
falls to a full toss, gets forward and pings extra cover with a firm drive, White there tumbles forward with the screamer in his hands
runs a short of a length ball to point from the crease
reaches out and paddles from outside off behind square leg
stayed low outside off as it spun away, under-edged into the ground
pushed back to the bowler
too much turn outside off, he abandoned the thought of having a cut at it
defended down the pitch
reaches forward and drives it past extra cover
cuts from close to the body, down to third man
jams out a slow yorker towards extra cover
beats the outside edge now, straightens it from a good length, Kamran goes pushing at it
length ball punched from the crease to mid on
walks out and drives a low full toss to long off
comes in slightly from back of a length, guided to point
false stroke first ball, opens up to try and clobber it over midwicket, top-edge weakly spoons up towards vacant mid off
punched down towards long off
flat and shortish, he backs away and slaps it past extra cover, sweeper cuts it off
that has been slammed high over extra cover, with the spin, full one tossed up ball, Kamran reaches to the pitch and opens the face even as he gets a lot of power in the shot
mistimes a pull in the air down to deep midwicket
he has played this shot at will all innings, another full one lofted inside out over extra cover
swivels to a sharp back of a length ball and gets the pull over midwicket
cuts one widish outside off to cover
defends a good length ball solidly to extra cover
finds extra cover with a punch now
that is it then, pitched up and swinging in a bit around off, and Malik lofts it with a very straight followthrough high over mid on
